name: dissolute
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
(of a person) living in a way that other people strongly disapprove of: He led a dissolute life, drinking, and womanizing till his death. Synonyms
debauched
degenerate formal disapproving
dissipated formal disapproving
fast
immoral
